Current Development: River Ridge

Only 6 Lots Available!

We have 6 beautiful lots still available in our River Ridge development. 3 of these back on to the grand river with fantastic views. Build your dream home in a fantastic subdivision surrounded by nature!

Pricing

For the 45’ lots (209, 210, 211, 212), the minimum square footage is 2,500 and the base price is $539,900.
For the 50’ and 55’ lots (105, 106, 107, 207), the minimum square footage is 3,000 and the base price is $589,900.
For every additional 100 square feet, it adds approx. $10,000.

Why Us? The Majestic Homes Process and Relationship

When you build with Majestic Homes you are creating a long lasting partnership working directly with Razvan to build your dream home. In relationships with other builders home owners feel there is a fence between themselves and the builder, at Majestic Homes there is no fence! We only build 6-7 homes a year and the builder/owner of the company, Raz, is personally involved with each build. You have his email address and cell phone number.

Phase 1: Your Home, Your Design

Majestic Homes is a custom home builder, you are not limited to a small set of floor plans and elevations, instead you work with a home designer to plan your dream home.

Some clients arrive to the designer with a very clear idea of what they want, others start with a blank piece of paper and describe how they live and a plan materializes. The only constraints are the size of the building envelope for your lot and your budget. Once you have a plan Majestic homes will provide the starting price for your home at which point you sign your agreement with Majestic Homes that includes the closing date for your home.

Example Floor Plans

  • Floor Plan 1
  • Floor Plan 2
  • Floor Plan 3

Phase 2: Construction of Home, Flexibility and Partnership

Continuing the Custom Home process you will work with Majestic Homes and our fine vendors to make selections for all items in your home. A standard builder typically offers limited selections for options within your home. At Majestic Homes every option is flexible and under your control! Instead of a small "design center" where you make all selections you visit vendors directly and work with them to select each option for your home. Here are just some of the options you will have control over during construction of your home:

Exterior

  • Front Entrance Door
  • Window Size, Style and Color
  • Stone and Brick
  • Shingles and Fascia
  • Garage Door and Hardware

Interior

  • Kitchen and Bath Cabinetry
  • Door Style and Hardware
  • Hardwood, Carpet and Tiles
  • Baseboards and Trim
  • Paint and Stain Color

 

  • Furnace
  • Fireplace
  • Electrical Outlets and Switches
  • Plumbing Fixtures

The sheer number of selections can feel overwhelming at times but Majestic Homes will provide you with a framework of timelines for each selection and contact information for the vendors. As selections are made any additional pricing for options that are beyond standards will be provided. If you have any trouble making decisions Majestic Homes is there to help with ideas and discussion.

Some of our Vendors

  • Vendor 1
  • Vendor 2
  • Vendor 3

Phase 3: Posssession of your Home, Warranty Coverage

The partnership with Majestic Homes doesn't end when you move into your home. Once settled you will have many opportunities to address any concerns with your home directly with Majestic Homes and through the Tarion New Home Warranty

We want your home to be perfect and exactly as you imagined, if something isn't right we don't rest until you're satisfied!

Testimonials

If we could do it again, we wouldn't have done it any other way! After spending two years researching all the big production builders in the area, we came across an opportunity to build a home with Majestic Homes.

We had never considered a small builder, but it became evident early in the design & build process with Majestic Homes that we had made the right choice.

Working with Majestic Homes was truly a great experience from beginning to end. We got to work directly with the builder for a unique customized experience. He was very caring and professional and treated our home as if it was his. His team of professionals, including the real estate agent, the architect, his trades, and his suppliers were extremely helpful and thorough and made the process very seamless.

We are very pleased with quality and attention put into our new home!

Julie and Chris, Kitchener

Shannon and I have been in the house for a little over two weeks now and we just wanted to write to say that we couldn’t be happier. The first and best surprise was that we were actually in our new home for the holidays – I still can’t believe that you were able to complete the house on time and meet our tight closing date!

On top of that, the house has been amazing – it has truly surpassed all of our hopes; the level of quality, detail and the overall craftsmanship is unbelievable.

This truly has been a one of a kind custom home building experience and we can’t wait to spend many of the years ahead in our wonderful home.

If we ever decide to build a new home again, it will definitely be with Majestic! – not just because of the beautiful home we have today, but because I now consider the owner a personal friend…

Thank you for everything you have done to make this process and our new home so amazing!

Shannon and Owen, Kitchener

Customer service was unmatched in our experience and, if were to do it again we wouldn't hesitate to choose Majestic Homes.

Joanna and Paul, Waterloo

We decided to go ahead with Majestic Homes, and Raz was instrumental in reducing the stress factor to an absolute minimum. We ended up with a quality home at a very good price, given all the extras Raz had included in the standard features.

Thank you Raz! We are already looking forward to our next Majestic home
